```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(flextable)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Introduction

This report details an analysis that reviews the ecological impacts of revised proposed water level thresholds for wetlands in the Gnangara mound.

Full analysis can be found [here] (https://github.com/ChrisKav/DWER-Thresholds-2019)

# EMP 173


```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
load("EMP_173/water_level.RData")

autofit(flextable(sw.sum, col_keys = c("Period",
                    "Mean max seasonal level (mAHD)",
                    "Mean min seasonal level (mAHD)",
                    "Mean seasonal change (m)",
                    "Month of maximum",
                    "Month of minimum",
                    "Mean max to min (days)")))

kable(sw.sum, digits=c(20,1,1,2,10,10,0), align='c', 
      col.names = c("Period",
                    "Mean max seasonal level (mAHD)",
                    "Mean min seasonal level (mAHD)",
                    "Mean seasonal change (m)",
                    "Month of maximum",
                    "Month of minimum",
                    "Mean max to min (days)"),
      row.names = FALSE,
      format="pandoc", booktabs=TRUE) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options="scale_down")

```
